Class MimicChest

java.lang.Object
com.university.elements.boxes.MimicChest
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBox, IEventListener
public class MimicChest extends Object implements IBox, IEventListener
Represents a mimic chest in the game that attacks the player when opened
